trans-unit.source: Games for Windows and the DirectX SDK
trans-unit.target: Games for Windows and the DirectX SDK

trans-unit.source: [Win2D](https://github.com/Microsoft/Win2D) - An easy-to-use Windows Runtime API for immediate mode 2D graphics rendering with GPU acceleration.
trans-unit.target: [Win2D](https://github.com/Microsoft/Win2D) - An easy-to-use Windows Runtime API for immediate mode 2D graphics rendering with GPU acceleration.

trans-unit.source: [ANGLE for Windows Store](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=618387) - Runs OpenGL ES content on Windows by translating OpenGL ES API calls to DirectX 11 API calls.
trans-unit.target: [ANGLE for Windows Store](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=618387) - Runs OpenGL ES content on Windows by translating OpenGL ES API calls to DirectX 11 API calls.
